about_the_game:
In this Action-Roguelite you create your own map in each run and get to decide whether you want to go straight to the bosses or fight more enemies to get stronger. Collect resources from different biomes to upgrade your village and rescue people to unlock more advantages for your next adventures.

The Beginning of Your Journey

After the last capable hunter failed to return from the ever-changing dungeon a few years ago, you decided to take on this role. Your village consists almost only of empty and collapsed houses, but if you can stand up to the monsters, you will be able to breathe new life into it again.

The Biomes

The dungeon is a mysterious place where one biome follows another. For example, you can go from a lush forest to a scorching desert, or from an eerie graveyard to a crystal plane. Each biome brings you different materials that are important for expanding your village. The further you advance, the more diverse the selection of biomes and materials becomes.

The Energies

To get stronger on your adventures, you can make use of the biomes' energies after defeating all the monsters on a field. There are offensive, defensive and special energies, and when you collect enough of one type, its level increases and you can choose from three improvements associated with that energy. Some of the improvements are passive and increase, for example, your maximum health or your material yield, while others change the attacks or movements you can carry out.

New and Old Acquaintances

During your excursions into the dungeon you will also meet other people from time to time which you can take back to your village. Some of them were already thought lost, others you are yet to meet. If you help someone, they will definitely want to show you their appreciation and support you in their very own way.

The Village

Many years ago it originated as a refuge for lost travelers and has become the home of a small community where everyone contributed something to the prosperity of all. Meanwhile, hardly anyone is left and the village seems lost. Fortunately, there are many people wandering around the dungeon with all sorts of useful skills, just waiting for you to find and save them. With their help, the village can flourish again.

Feature List

  • Reinvent yourself with every run in this unique roguelite.
  • Depending on your selected start biome you start your adventure with different classes.
  • Absorb up to three energies provided by the biomes and specialize in offensive, defensive or special skills.
  • Explore the ever-changing dungeon and uncover all its secrets.
  • Discover numerous biomes with a wide variety of enemies.
  • Each biome provides valuable materials to transform your village from a small refuge into a paradise.
  • Rescue helpful NPCs that will bring you indispensable improvements.
  • Enjoy many temporary as well as permanent upgrades.
  • Prove your skills in battles against powerful bosses.
  • Choose the next puzzle piece wisely to get the most out of your current run.
  • Fill your logbook with countless useful discoveries.
  • Have engaging and witty conversations with your villagers and complete challenging quests.
